column17:
This simple and trendy saree will give you a traditional look. In orange colour with a printed pattern this saree comes from the house of Shivam Prints. The saree has been crafted with chiffon fabric and is easy to carry and maintain.

Features
  • Brand: Shivam Prints
  • Category: Traditional and Ethnic Wear
  • Type: Sarees
  • Fabric: Chiffon
  • Colour: Yellow Orange
  • Saree Length (in mts.): 5.4
  • Blouse Length (in mts.): 0.80

Wash & Care
Wash it with a mild detergent.
If washing in a machine set it on a delicate mode and low temperature cycle.
Wash dark colours separately and use iron at low temperature.
